src_original: ṣaṭtriṁśatsumerūṇāṁ yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ |  bhavanti tasyānucarāḥ sarvavajradharopamāḥ || 9 || -40- |
gaṅgāvālukasamān kalpān sphared dṛḍhāgravajriṇaḥ || 58 ||  ityāha bhagavān samayābhijñaḥ |
mūḍhe mohātmakaṁ yogaṁ moharatyā samanvitam || 118 ||  niḥsekānmohadhārābhirmohavajraḥ svayaṁ bhavet |  dviṣṭe dveṣātmakaṁ yogaṁ dveṣaratyā samanvitam || 119 ||
niḥsekād jñānadhārābhiḥ prajñājñānaḥ svayaṁ bhavet |  tāmeva devatāḥ vidyāṁ gṛhya śiṣyasya vajriṇaḥ || 122 ||
hastaṁ dattvā śire śiṣyaṁ mucyate guruvajriṇā || 123 ||
-130- tasmād viyogaḥ saṁsāre na kārye bhavatā sadā |
